name: Nobunaga no Yabou Tenshouki with Power-Up Kit
overview: Nobunaga no Yabou Tenshouki with Power-Up Kit (信長の野望・天翔記 ｗｉｔｈ パワーアップキット) is a re-released version of Nobunaga no Yabou Tenshouki for the Sega Saturn, adding the contents of the game's expansion pack (or "power-up kit" as it is known in this context).
